metadata.title: CVE-2017-9042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: readelf.c in GNU Binutils 2017-04-12 has a "cannot be represented in typelong" issue, which might allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
